DESCRIPTION:
Continuation of the legendary series of Rayman, in the last fifteen years has won worldwide acclaim and admiration, it became a bestseller on all major gaming systems. Now this game is available for owners of personal computers!
Welcome to the magical world, whose inhabitants love to eat eat, sleep soundly, and sometimes venturing friendly brawl. Here are just next door lies a dark swamp, and there was about a different cohort. Order and wait for trouble! But among fans of free life there are characters that can repulse any excessively high-handed aggressor. Romping and restless Rayman, his best friend and a couple of desperate Globoks wizards are ready for the most unusual adventure in a unique cartoon-comic style!
======================================================================================================================================================================

DESCRIPTION:
Rayman Legends - continuing a dizzying adventure Rayman and his company! Now the main character and his friends went on a trip to the magical forest. Taking a walk among the trees, they found an old tent filled with interesting pictures. It seems to be nothing special, if one of these paintings are not moved Reiman and his friends from the medieval world. It is here that began the most exciting part of the trip.
Learn the secrets of each of the paintings and defeat all the enemies with fabulous Reiman, Trixie and Globoksom. Quick reflexes, skills, Smekaev - it's all very much require you to explore the beautiful and magical medieval world. You are waiting for a fascinating three-dimensional levels and boss fights both in singles and in the cooperative mode. Help Reiman and his friends!
